lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic was reduced to tears after suffering a shock first round 7-6(4) 7-6(2) loss to Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro in the men's Olympic tennis tournament on Sunday.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic was reduced to tears after suffering a shock first round 7-6(4) 7-6(2) loss to Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro in the men's Olympic tennis tournament on Sunday....

headline.main: Del Potro Sends Djokovic Off in Tears
headline.print_headline: Del Potro Sends Djokovic Off in Tears
